title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 185.9 - Marking requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 185.9 - Marking requirements

State Regulations
(a) The
numerical count or the minimum diameter of the apples packed in a closed
container shall be indicated on the container. (b) When the numerical count is not shown the
minimum diameter shall be plainly stamped, stenciled, or otherwise marked on
the container in terms of whole inches, or whole inches and not less than
eighth inch fractions thereof, in accordance with the facts. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
185.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
